name: GDD Service
description: Growing Degree Day calculations and threshold tracking per grass type and area.

prd.problemStatement: Optimal application timing for many products depends on GDD accumulation, which varies by grass type and location. Automated GDD tracking ensures proper timing.
goals: Generate alerts when thresholds are met
userStories: As a superintendent, I want automatic GDD tracking so that I time applications at optimal GDD windows
As a superintendent, I want grass-specific thresholds so that calculations are accurate for my turf
